title: Judge Faith Jenkins Interview and more
itunes:title: Judge Faith Jenkins Interview and more
description:
Monday 3/19- Today on the show we had Judge Faith Jenkins stop by where she spoke about the O.J case, public defenders and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to O. J Simpson because of his comments towards Colin Kaepernick. Moreover, it was "Shoot Your Shot" Monday's so we had listeners call up to shoot their shot at their crush, and this time an Uber driver got lucky. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
